com.sap.cloud.sdk.frameworks.hystrix

Class HystrixUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sap.cloud.sdk.frameworks.hystrix.HystrixUtil

  • public final class HystrixUtil
extends Object
    An utility class handling the creation of Setter object that can be used to initialize Hystrix Command objects.

    Therefore this class also handles the creation of command keys based on user and tenant Ids.

    • Method Detail

      • getDelimiter

        public static String getDelimiter()
        The delimiter to be used between each component of the key.
        Returns:
        The delimiter used in the key.

      • getCommandKey

        public static String getCommandKey(Class<?> commandClass,
                                   @Nullable
                                   String tenantId,
                                   @Nullable
                                   String userName)
        Constructs a command key for the given tenant identifier and user name, independent of whether they are null or not. This provides the highest flexibility for defining different levels of isolation.
        Parameters:
        commandClass - Class of the command.
        tenantId - The identifier of the tenant. If null, there is not tenant isolation.
        userName - The name of the user. If null, there is no user isolation.
        Returns:
        A new command key constructed from the given tenant identifier and user name.

      • getGlobalKey

        public static String getGlobalKey(Class<?> commandClass)
        Returns a global command key without any isolation.
        Parameters:
        commandClass - The class of the command for which the key should be created.
        Returns:
        A global command key without any isolation.

      • getTenantAndUserIsolatedKey

        public static String getTenantAndUserIsolatedKey(Class<?> commandClass)
                                          throws UserNotAuthenticatedException
        Returns a tenant- and user-isolated command key.
        Parameters:
        commandClass - The class of the command for which the key should be created.
        Returns:
        A tenant- and user-isolated command key.
        Throws:
        UserNotAuthenticatedException - If the current User is not authenticated.

      • getTenantIsolatedKey

        public static String getTenantIsolatedKey(Class<?> commandClass)
                                   throws TenantNotAvailableException
        Returns a tenant-isolated command key.
        Parameters:
        commandClass - The class of the command for which the key should be created.
        Returns:
        A tenant-isolated command key.
        Throws:
        TenantNotAvailableException - If there is currently no Tenant available. This typically occurs when trying to access the tenant within code that is running outside any tenant context, e.g., within a background task.

      • getDefaultErpCommandSetter

        public static com.netflix.hystrix.HystrixCommand.Setter getDefaultErpCommandSetter(Class<?> type)
        Pre-initializes a Hystrix Setter to be used to instantiate a Command.
        Parameters:
        type - The class of the command to prepare the setter for.
        Returns:
        A Setter ready to initialize a Command.

      • getDefaultErpCommandSetter

        public static com.netflix.hystrix.HystrixCommand.Setter getDefaultErpCommandSetter(Class<?> commandClass,
                                                                                   com.netflix.hystrix.HystrixCommandProperties.Setter commandProperties)
        Pre-initializes a Hystrix Setter to be used to instantiate a Command.
        Parameters:
        commandClass - The class of the command to prepare the setter for.
        commandProperties - Default properties for the command to execute.
        Returns:
        A Setter ready to initialize a Command.

      • getDefaultErpCommandProperties

        public static com.netflix.hystrix.HystrixCommandProperties.Setter getDefaultErpCommandProperties()
        Getter for default command properties to be used by a Hystrix Command.
        Returns:
